name: Journey's End (itch) (Tangly)
description:
GameDev.Tv Game Jam 2022 

You revive in a Cavern your body lost, colour is gone only shades of grey remain. Where are you what should you do.

Had Great fun creating a little project, I didn't get to start till Friday so unfortunately ran out of time to add much gameplay, you know in a game jam, but in the end it end I'm happy with the 30 seconds it lasts.

Github :

github.com/TwistedTangly/Death-is-Only-The-Beginning
